options.title: -f, --canonicalize
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively; all but the last component must exist

options.title: -f, --canonicalize
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively; all but the last component must exist

options.title: -e, --canonicalize-existing
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively, all components must exist

options.title: -e, --canonicalize-existing
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively, all components must exist

options.title: -m, --canonicalize-missing
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively, without requirements on components existence

options.title: -m, --canonicalize-missing
options.description: canonicalize by following every symlink in every component of the given name recursively, without requirements on components existence

options.title: -n, --no-newline
options.description: do not output the trailing delimiter

options.description: do not output the trailing delimiter

options.title: -s, --silent
options.description: suppress most error messages (on by default)

options.title: -s, --silent
options.description: suppress most error messages (on by default)

options.title: -z, --zero
options.description: end each output line with NUL, not newline
